comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
From the Commonwealth War Graves Commission website:

Name:THOMPSON, GEORGE TINSLEY
Initials:G T
Nationality:New Zealand
Rank:Serjeant
Regiment/Service:Auckland Mounted Rifles, N.Z.E.F.
Age:24
Date of Death:07/08/1915
Service No:13/144
Additional information:Son of George Edward and Emily Thompson, of Port Albert.
Casualty Type:Commonwealth War Dead
Grave/Memorial Reference:1.
Memorial:CHUNUK BAIR (NEW ZEALAND) MEMORIAL

comment.author: 10758109@N04
comment._content: George's Cenotaph database record with photos of memorials: muse.aucklandmuseum.com/databases/Cenotaph/15702.detail?O... His military records are available but with restrictions: archway.archives.govt.nz/ViewFullItem.do?code=7825532 His probate is available: archway.archives.govt.nz/ViewFullItem.do?code=23026534 Cheers Sarndra
